## PopulatableProtocol interface

Prepare transactions for sending.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PopulatableProtocol<R = unknown, S = unknown, P = unknown> extends _PopulatableFrom<SendableProtocol<R, S>, P> 
```
**Extends:** \_PopulatableFrom&lt;[SendableProtocol](./stablecoin-lib-base.sendableprotocol.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, S&gt;, P&gt;

## Remarks

The functions return an object implementing [PopulatedTransactionInterface](./stablecoin-lib-base.populatedtransactioninterface.md)<!-- -->, which can be used to send the transaction and get a [SentProtocolTransaction](./stablecoin-lib-base.sentprotocoltransaction.md)<!-- -->.

Implemented by [PopulatableEthers](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.populatableethers.md)<!-- -->.
